alert.note: Alert for Gove; Greeley; Logan; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 05 at 10:39AM CST until March 05 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Critical Fire Weather Conditions Today... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 013, 014, 027, 028, 029, 041, 042, AND 254... * Affected Area...In Colorado, Fire Weather Zone 254 Cheyenne. In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 013 Sherman, Fire Weather Zone 014 Thomas, Fire Weather Zone 027 Wallace, Fire Weather Zone 028 Logan, Fire Weather Zone 029 Gove, Fire Weather Zone 041 Greeley and Fire Weather Zone 042 Wichita. * Winds...Southwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 11 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or are imminent. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Gove; Greeley; Logan; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace; Wichita
